data.enText: applies
applying
applied
applied
for job/course
to make a formal request, usually in writing, for sth such as a job, a place at college, university, etc.

data.chText: 申请工作 / 护照 / 拨款
data.enText: to apply for a job/passport/grant
to apply to a company/university

data.chText: 你应该当面 / 写信申请。
data.enText: You should apply in person/by letter .
He has applied to join the army.
use
to use sth or make sth work in a particular situation

data.chText: 采用经济制裁；施加政治压力
data.enText: to apply economic sanctions/political pressure

data.chText: 这项新技术已应用于农业。
data.enText: The new technology was applied to farming.
paint/cream
to put or spread sth such as paint, cream, etc. onto a surface

data.chText: 把乳霜薄薄地抹在脸和脖子上。
data.enText: Apply the cream sparingly to your face and neck.
be relevant

before.enText: not used in the progressive tenses

data.enText: to concern or relate to sb/sth
Special conditions apply if you are under 18.

data.chText: 我所说的只涉及你们中的一些人。
data.enText: What I am saying applies only to some of you.

data.chText: “乏味”这个词绝对和她的小说沾不上边儿。
data.enText: The word ‘unexciting’ could never be applied to her novels.
work hard
to work at sth or study sth very hard

data.chText: 努力学习就会通过考试。
data.enText: You would pass your exams if you applied yourself.

data.chText: 我们绞尽脑汁寻求解决问题的办法。
data.enText: We applied our minds to finding a solution to our problem.
press hard
to press on sth hard with your hand, foot, etc. to make sth work or have an effect on sth
to apply the brakes (of a vehicle)
Pressure applied to the wound will stop the bleeding.

ex.chText: 她只向一所大学提出申请并被录取了。
ex.enText: She only applied to one university and was accepted.

synonyms.bx: 通常指通过提交书面材料来进行正式申请，常后接介词 for/to。

ex.chText: 要一杯饮料/要求解释/求职
ex.enText: ask for a drink/an explanation/a job
You can ask him for a favour.

synonyms.bx: 指说出让某人给予某物或做某事的想法，常后接介词 for。

ex.enText: They were forced to sue for peace.

synonyms.bx: 尤指在法庭上提出请求。

ex.chText: 他用什么运送食品杂货？
ex.enText: What does he use for picking up groceries?

ex.chText: 很明显，他只是在利用你。
ex.enText: It was obvious that he was just using you.

ex.chText: 他利用自己的经理一职公款吃喝。
ex.enText: He used his position as manager to banquet at public expenses.

synonyms.bx: 泛指使用工具、设备、服务等，也指利用某人或某项优势。

ex.chText: 他们把新技术运用到该领域。
ex.enText: They applied the new technology to this field.

ex.chText: 难道你不觉得这些方法很难实际应用吗？
ex.enText: Don't you think that these ideas are difficult to apply in practice?

synonyms.bx: 指将技术、方法、观念、法律等用于某一领域、流程、活动等中以发挥其作用。

ex.chText: 每年多少学生能够利用这种机会？
ex.enText: How many students can avail themselves of this opportunity each year?

ex.chText: 这家酒店鼓励旅客充分利用各种娱乐设施。
ex.enText: This hotel encourages the guests to avail themselves of the full range of recreation facilities.

synonyms.bx: 多指利用机会、提议等，常用于 avail oneself of sth 结构中。

ex.chText: 这间教室主要用于培训。
ex.enText: This classroom is mainly utilized for training purposes.

ex.chText: 你们必须考虑如何更好地利用所掌握的资源。
ex.enText: You must consider how to better utilize the resources at your disposal.

ex.chText: 罗马人何时开始使用混凝土作建筑材料的？
ex.enText: When did the Romans begin to utilize concrete as a building material?

synonyms.bx: 指为了某一目的而使用某事物。

example: He applied for a leave of absence
She applied for college
apply for a job

tr: refer (a word or name) to a person or thing
example: He applied this racial slur to me!

tr: make work or employ for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose
example: use your head!
we only use Spanish at home
I can't use this tool
Apply a magnetic field here
This thinking was applied to many projects
How do you utilize this tool?
I apply this rule to get good results
use the plastic bags to store the food
He doesn't know how to use a computer
She applied paint to the back of the house
Put on make-up!
She gave him First Aid
I gave him a punch in the nose

tr: ensure observance of laws and rules
example: Apply the rules to everyone
apply a principle
practice a religion
use care when going down the stairs
use your common sense
practice non-violent resistance
Please apply yourself to your homework

tr: be pertinent or relevant or applicable
example: The same laws apply to you!
This theory holds for all irrational numbers
The same rules go for everyone
This theory lends itself well to our new data

value.def: If you apply for something such as a job or membership of an organization, you write a letter or fill in a form in order to ask formally for it.

example.ex: I am continuing to apply for jobs...
They may apply to join the organization.
example.tran: 他们可以申请加入该组织。

value.def: If you apply yourself to something or apply your mind to something, you concentrate hard on doing it or on thinking about it.

example.ex: Faulks has applied himself to this task with considerable energy...
example.tran: 福克斯为这项任务倾注了大量精力。

example.ex: In spare moments he applied his mind to how rockets could be used to make money.
example.tran: 在业余时间他潜心研究如何能用火箭来赚钱。

value.tran: 使（自己）全神贯注于；使（注意力等）集中于

value.def: If something such as a rule or a remark applies to a person or in a situation, it is relevant to the person or the situation.

example.ex: The convention does not apply to us...
example.tran: 这条惯例对我们不适用。

example.ex: The rule applies where a person owns stock in a corporation.
example.tran: 该规定适用于持有公司股票的人。

value.def: If you apply something such as a rule, system, or skill, you use it in a situation or activity.

example.ex: The Government appears to be applying the same principle...
example.tran: 政府似乎是在运用相同的原则。

example.ex: His project is concerned with applying the technology to practical business problems.
example.tran: 他的项目是将这项技术应用于实际的商务问题。

value.def: A name that is applied to someone or something is used to refer to them.

example.ex: Connell said a new medical term should be applied to Berg's actions. He calls it 'medicide'.
example.tran: 康奈尔说应该用一个新的医学名词描述伯格的行为。他称之为“医生协助自杀”。

value.def: If you apply something to a surface, you put it on or rub it into the surface.

example.ex: The right thing would be to apply direct pressure to the wound...
example.tran: 正确的做法是直接按住伤口。

example.ex: Applying the dye can be messy, particularly on long hair.
example.tran: 涂抹染发剂可能会搞得一团糟，特别是长发。

value.def: When the driver of a vehicle applies the brakes, he or she uses them to slow the vehicle down or to stop it from moving.

example.ex: They forgot to apply the handbrake and the car rolled 60ft into the river.
example.tran: 他们忘了拉手刹，汽车翻滚了60英尺，掉进了河里。

trans: 谋职；求职；申请一个职位；申请职位；职位
减少对…之消耗量；努力，致力于…

queryExplainVideo.detail: apply的词根及延申词汇讲解
